posts.title: Freertos-learning
posts.text: 在加入Mechax之前，只能说对freertos这种real time operating system不能说一点不懂，只能说是从未听说… Introduction to RTOSGPOS (General Purpose Operating System) Tasks scheduling Resource mangement Device drivers RROS (Real-Time Operating System) Tasks scheduling Resource mangement Device drivers(Blutooth WIFI) Super Loop -> Micro controller missing data? RTOS Task: set of program instructions loaded in memory Thread: unit of CPU utilization with its own program counter and stack Process: instance of computer programIn RTOS task = thread 似乎以上就是第一次想说的…hhh The End 😎😊

posts.title: Hello World!
posts.text: Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
